00041 void niboCom_putchar(uint8_t c){
00042         while(uart0_txfull() == true);
00043         uart0_putchar(c);
00044         delay(2);
00045 }
00046 
00047 uint8_t niboCom_getchar(){
00048         if(uart0_rxempty()==false) return uart0_getchar();
00049         return 0;
00050 }

00053 void niboCom_putPackage(uint8_t cmd, uint8_t size, uint8_t *data){
00054         int i = 0;
00055 
00056         niboCom_putchar(0x68);
00057         niboCom_putchar(cmd);
00058         niboCom_putchar(size);
00059         for(i = 0; i < size;i++){
00060                 niboCom_putchar(data[i]);
00061         }
00062         niboCom_putchar(0x16);
00063 }

00065 void niboCom_putIRDistance(uint16_t *data){
00066         int i = 0;
00067         uint8_t distance[5];
00068         for(i = 0; i < 5;i++){
00069                 distance[i] = data[i]/256;
00070         }
00071 
00072         niboCom_putPackage(niboCom_cmd_ir_distance,5, distance);
00073 }

00090 uint8_t niboCom_getCMD(){
00091 
00092         uint8_t tmp = lastCMD;
00093         if(tmp != niboCom_cmd_none){
00094                 lastCMD = niboCom_cmd_none;
00095         }
00096 
00097         return tmp;
00098 }

00101 void niboCom_uartInterrupt(){
00102         while(uart0_rxempty() == true);
00103         uint8_t c = niboCom_getchar();
00104 
00105 //      char output[21] = "";
00106 //      sprintf(output, "sign: %1i", c);
00107 //      advDisplay_append_line(output);
00108 
00109         if(c == 0x68){
00110                 startSign = true;
00111         }
00112         else if(startSign != true){
00113                 return;
00114         }
00115 
00116         buffer[bufferPos++] = c;
00117 
00118         if(bufferPos == 4){
00119                 bufferPos = 0;
00120                 startSign = false;
00121                 if(c == 0x16){
00122                         lastCMD = buffer[1];
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 
00126 }
